name: Ice-Cream Mayhem
description:
Bring joy to kids (and adults) everywhere! 

Menu Controls: WASD and Space

Game Controls:
Movement: WASD
Boost: Shift key. You need at least 25% Turbo to use this! Naturally refills.
Aiming is with the Mouse
Shooting is Left Mouse Button
Rapid Fire: Press R to activate rapid fire! Hold down the Left Mouse Button during this. 15 seconds of Rapid Fire and 20 seconds of cool-down. 

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheOfficialRamZ

Extra Info:
2 main levels.

1 secret mission (you access it via the Level Select after finding the not so secret secret).
